name: Energy Overload
description: Charge your fists with the power of the storm, replacing your Light and Heavy Attacks with new, stronger abilities.  Each attack restores 1192 Magicka.  Light Attacks become lightning bolts, dealing 2399 Shock Damage to an enemy up to 28 meters away.    Heavy Attacks blast enemies in a 4 x 6 area for 2160 Shock Damage.  Attacks deplete Ultimate until you run out, or the ability is toggled off.
effectLines: Light and Heavy Attacks restore Magicka.
